website_summaries.verdict: Uses rayon derived from bamboo blended fibers to deliver a cooling feeling throughout the night. Hypoallergenic, so ideal for those with allergies or asthma.
pros: Extremely durable mattress protector that will give you a high level of performance and longevity
Works well for kids, adults, and pets
Can be machine washed when it needs to be cleaned
Will fit over your mattress tightly with high-quality elastic band all the way around the sheet
cons: Some liquids may penetrate this material over time

customer_reviews.title: Pee leaked through. I had a sheet over this ...
customer_reviews.text: Pee leaked through. I had a sheet over this “waterproof” layer over another sheet over a second of these “waterproof” layers. Pee leaked through TWO of these the very first time we used them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 little girls

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT PROTECT AGAINST FLUIDS AND LIQUID! Sorry for ...
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT PROTECT AGAINST FLUIDS AND LIQUID! Sorry for yelling, but I'm just as mad as myself for buying two of them, ignoring the negative reviews, as I am with the manufacturer. I was thinking that maybe the people that had given it negative reviews did not follow the washing and drying instructions and that it was user error. Definitely not the case in my situation. Follow the instructions to a 'T'.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This unfortunately has not stopped any liquid from leaking through to our mattress. My son sneaks in our bed occasionally at night and has had a handful of accidents and I now have a handful of stains on my mattress. I will unfortunately be getting rid of this one and purchasing a different product.
customer_reviews.author: K-me

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions when washing & drying!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly, even with larger amounts of liquid (i.e., urine). The liquid absolutely does NOT seep through and the mattress stays dry, night after night. Unless you don't launder the protector as directed. My daughter washed the mattress protector and put it in the dryer on high. The next night, all the wetness soaked right through. Also worth mentioning: this product is extremely absorbant and holds a lot of liquid. It becomes very heavy in the washing machine and occasionally causes the load to become unbalanced on the spin cycle. (I have an HE top load washing machine.)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Not cool and breathable.
customer_reviews.text: Returning. I live in a warm climate and it retains the heat making it too hot to sleep. I was very disappointed in the product. When stating that it remains cool and breathable in the title of sale - that is extremely misleading. Now I'm inconvenienced with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Akana

customer_reviews.title: Breathable? Not a chance!
customer_reviews.text: Hot, uncomfortable, sweaty...this thing doesn't breathe. As a test, I used a bicycle pump to see if I could get air to pass through. I almost broke the pump. Maybe the fabric on top of the membrane was "breathable" but the protective layer... not a chance. I will say the description, photos and illustrations were very convincing. Too bad they were B.S.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robin

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is all around great. It does everything it claims to do. I've had many other cheap feeling mattress protectors that take away from the comfort of my mattress. This one does not. It soft and great quality. The king size fits my king bed perfectly. In your typically mattress store they sell protectors like this for at least 5 times the price. I would 100% recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Ruined after 1st wash
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this haven’t even used it yet I washed it so my three-year-old can lay on top of it and after the first wash the backside stuck together and I had to pull it apart How is this supposed to be waterproof to prevent accidents but it ruins after the first cycle even tho I tumbled on low.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA CORDERO

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again-not liquid proof
customer_reviews.text: While this product has material that seems durable and easy to clean I can in fact say it is not liquid proof. I use this cover on my toddler’s mattress. My toddler urinated through his diaper onto his sheets. It went right through the bamboo mattress cover. So if you’re going to use this cover, make sure you have something else underneath of it otherwise your mattress will get wet.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Can I return this?
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it! It made my mattress hotter. I own a cooling mattress but when I covered it with this made me hot at night even tho' I had my AC going. I don't like the feeling of it and I might mistaken but l felt the plastic material in it. I washed it first before I used it followed its instruction. I had it for 3 days and now it's in the corner inside my closet. I was wondering if I can return it without the original packing/plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dheen

customer_reviews.title: but it also literally made me sleep so much better due to the cooling properties
customer_reviews.text: Paid full price for this item. I use a foam mattress that sleeps hot, not to mention due to our old house’s weird bedroom layout, we had to put the bed over a vent, so hot air still sleeps into the mattress despite the vents being covered. I used to sleep on the floor sometimes during winter because it got so hot. Then I got this mattress protector, and not only it helped with protecting from my puppy’s accidents, but it also literally made me sleep so much better due to the cooling properties. It is not loud and doesn’t make rustling sounds. And yes, it’s protected my mattress from actual puppy accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Code Doll

customer_reviews.title: Fits 7 inch mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older mattress that is 7 inches high. It's almost impossible to get bedding to fit. I purchased this Mattress Protector hoping it would hug the mattress and not slip around during the night like many others have in the past. I sleep with dogs so I need waterproof! As always, one of my dogs started licking his paw almost immediately after I put this on the bed. No moisture went through to the mattress. The sides are stretchy enough so that they hug the mattress firmly enough not to slip during the night. Wonderful! I'll definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Albs

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is very thick and soft. It is perfectly sized for my king size pillow top mattress. It breathes well. The only drawback is that it holds a TON of water in the wash. I have a washer with an electronic sensor and it messed it up. It keeps the water running over and over in the rinse cycle. It has happened every time. I have to stop the machine and change it to a spin only cycle after it has rinsed for what seems like forever. Dont leave the house with this on.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Add this to your baby registry!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new baby, and I cannot tell you how often this has saved our mattress. Leaky diaper? No worries! A fountain of spit-up? No worries! Mama waking up with her shirt soaked in breast milk? No worries! Postpartum bleeding that escaped the diaper-sized pads they give you? No worries! Dog vomit? No worries! Again- this protector has saved our mattress. It washes well and seems stain resistant. (After what we have put it through, how can it still not have a stain?!?) The fabric feels like fabric- not plastic. You can't even tell it is on the mattress. I am a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Klassy Kat

customer_reviews.title: great pad, definitely water-proof
customer_reviews.text: great pad, definitely water-proof. We bought it to protect the mattress and the topper from our cat who periodically pees in the bed. The reason i'm docking it a star is because it takes forever to dry. Like 3 cycles on high heat. It holds water like crazy which is a good thing for water-proofing but not a good thing when you need to wash it and put it back on the bed. I actually wanted to buy a 2nd one as a spare so i wouldn't be up for hours waiting for it to dry but the seller jacked the price up by 50% so i went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ella G

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice, leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: Not even remotely waterproof!! It fits great, is super soft, doesn’t move at all. So, it’s ideal in all other ways. But, the first “accident” on this soaked straight thru to the mattress. Brand new mattress totally soaked in one spot. I hope I can get the smell out!! I am beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. BurnettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a stain on my new mattress, which is puzzling because we don't sleep without the protector being on. We assumed water or something leaked and stained our mattress. Also saw a small tear near the edge of the protector. Expected a quality product but got stuck with a inferior protector.
customer_reviews.author: Javier E

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! We co sleep with my 2 year old and we are about to have a new baby too. I wanted something that would protect our new mattress from potential diaper leaks and blow outs, and this is perfect! It’s super comfy, doesn’t make any noise at all, and protects from liquids! When I wash it, it does take a while to dry... but I imagine it’s because of the waterproof fabric, and the fact that it needs to be on low heat. Takes about 1.5 hours to dry. Not a huge deal to me, as it keeps my mattress nice and protected.
customer_reviews.author: BeTalvy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER PROOF, bought 3 and PEE LEAK THROUGH ALL 3!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FAULSE ADVERTISING, ABSOLUTELY NOT WATER PRROOF!!!! I have 3 boys under 5 and they all have their own beds (twin, full and queen) they all have within the last few months leak through this so call waterproof protector, I have to clean sheets, comforter, mattress at the mid of night with the mess. Save yourself some money and buy any other brands, this is a LIE and a JOKE!!!! 🤬🤬🤬
customer_reviews.author: Lil Ren

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. So much I bought one for every bed in the house (with small kids it was a wide investment). I don't think they crinkle at all really. I have had a water proof mattress cover that did and it was so annoying. The only drawback is the green writing on the mattress pad is too dark. It's easily visible through white sheets.
customer_reviews.author: ProudSAHM

customer_reviews.title: Works at first, but will fail.
customer_reviews.text: We own 7 of these. We have 8 year olds old twins and one of them still has accidents at night. With new My Green Mattresses we didn't want to take a chance. We've always put a towel underneath as a secondary precaution. Glad we did. We have 3 of them on each bed now and on particularly bad nights my son has gone nearly through all 3. They work great when you first get them but even following the washing/drying instructions they eventually lose their ability to hold liquid after a few washings. For the price, it's a good value but definitely double up and be prepared for them to fail. They will.
customer_reviews.author: TwinkiesMommy

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED/NOT WATER/PEE PROOF
customer_reviews.text: To Utopia... You should take your product back to testing. It is not water/pee proof. To consumers... There are other brands with better reviews. Be specific in your search. Search plastic mattress cover. Old products have been made better there not just gmas old plastic squeaky cover any more. But they are actually water/pee proof. My mistake was being lazy and not searching a little but more, and purchasing this headache. Dont you go and do the same!
customer_reviews.author: Princeville13

customer_reviews.title: Will absorb moisture but it will not soak through to mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have tiny dog that sometimes wets the bed while asleep. This does need to be taken off and laundered if this happens as the top layer is not water repellent but absorbent even though the bottom layer keeps it from soaking through into the mattress. I would not consider this useful for potty training. The tight but stretchy sides fit nicely on my deep sided mattress and do not slip off on the corners like my last cover did. All in all happy with this product so far. They seem like a quality product but too early to judge durability since I've needed to wash it just once since I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised upon opening the package how good the quality of the product seemed. The true test would be, however, how well it stayed in place on my bed. I have an adjustable bed - head and feet - and my old mattress protector would sometimes come loose from raising and lowering the head and foot of the mattress. This unit has been as snug as can be since I put it on. It has never moved or shifted in any way. Also, it's nicely quilted and comfortable! I wouldn't hesitate to buy this same product in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good...BUT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on your my California king mattress. I did a lot of research about bamboo material and settled on this because everyone stated that it’s slept cool. Sadly, I feel that it traps the heat and it really makes the sleeping experience on Pleasant. Especially whenever you’re going to town on your girl and she adds that extra body heat it really makes for an overall unpleasant experience. Quality construction and material though.
customer_reviews.author: The Primetime Kid

customer_reviews.title: Wet pad, dry mattress...what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is beyond my expectations. Out of the package it was very sturdy and soft. No bad odors and the design looks luxurious. Now for the test. First night, my grandson spent the night and was scared so slept with me....sure enough. He peed the bed and from the looks of it, multiple times. Not one drop reached my mattress. Completely dry. Washed in machine on cold water and dried on low heat....woo-laa! No stains, mattress cover looked good as new. Since the purchase was for two covers. I was able to make my bed right away and not wait for laundry to be done.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this thing is a pain to clean (line dry only) but it works great! We bought it to put over a new Tuft and Needle mattress. It fits easily and we have had zero leaks. My middle child is a puker, it happens easily and often. We are also potty training, so you know how that goes. The bed underneath this mattress protector is still pristine. I’ll also add that I sleep super hot and this really helps regulate my temperature well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flink

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT FOR A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a vacation home when I recently replaced multiple bedroom sets. These protectors are light-weight, soft, and while I haven't laundered them yet, I anticipate that the fabric will come out like new. They are not puffy so they don't offer a cushion effect; but they are not noisy and don't have the feel of a plastic or coated pad at all. It's like having invisible protection on the mattress. I recommended these to my daughter who is furnishing a vacation home with approximately 13-15 beds and I look forward to hearing how she likes them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Dickamore

customer_reviews.title: This was really nice and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product. It fit the bed really well, true to size. It is well made, attractive with the design instead of just plain white. It does have a cooling sensation to it and it protects my nice topper from stains etc. Don't think twice, buy it today if your looking for a great Mattress Protector .
customer_reviews.author: LAURA RENE'

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and it does keep your bed clean
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is a great mattress protector. I have now bought a total of 4 of these protectors, for 4 twin beds. I love that they are soft and they really work to keep the mattresses clean. I only wash them every once in a while, either do to a mess or just to freshen them up. So I have not washed them more than 12 times, and I wash them on a casual setting and then dry them on lower heat. So far they are holding up against my kiddos and I have not had to replace any of them yet. Two of the covers are over 2 years old and still look good. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolMom4

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Power
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my full sized bed. Needless to say, it's awesome! I even tested it by pouring half a cup of water on it, and it really didn't let any water seep through. While the bamboo protector absorbed the water, the mattress was left completely dry and all I had to do was let the protector dry (or wash it if you had dropped juice on it or something like that). Great protector, great price, no reason to consider anything else.
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: This one stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars except I haven't had it long enough for durability. It fits far enough underneath the mattress so that you need not worry about it coming off until you take it off. It even feels like it's padded more than it really is. We bought one for every other bed we have except for the split top. They do not make one for Split Top as yet. Waiting for the day. Also bought one for sleeper couch even though it is a mic too big. Another product I need to make. That makes a total of 5 bamboo mattress covers we have bought. Remember it is also waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Potter

customer_reviews.title: something you never thought you’d need. Strongly encouraged
customer_reviews.text: I took this and poured a cup of water over it when I first received it. The top was wet but the bottom piece was completely dry. The water droplets were rolling off. Low and behold 1 week later I got sick and vomited. All over the bed. And this thing came in handy! I wiped the vomit off and washed, dryed, presto. This thing saved my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: I’ve slept three nights on it so far and am pleased. My previous mattress protector did the job of protecting the mattress but it was too slick and I would get too warm at night. This mattress protector sleeps relatively cool and the sheets seem to stay in place. I like the thickness of it: it’s not too thick that it interferes with the support properties of the bed I bought. For those worried about odors, this one really doesn’t have an odor to speak of. I can highly recommend this product. If something changes, I’ll do an update but so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Great Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my mattress protector and wanted one that was water resistant. I have an elderly pet that sometimes has minor accidents and wanted protection for my mattress. Traditional waterproof protectors do not circulate air and I would wake up soaked in sweat. This mattress protector gives me the protection I need, but breaths and no sweating. When washed It does take a bit longer to dry than a traditional mattress protector, I run it through a light drying cycle and then hang to finish drying. Has held up very well. It is thinner than a traditional mattress protector, but I do not need extra padding just protection and this provides it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this replacement
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to replace our aging and ever so disfigured mattress protector we purchase from our local brick and mortar store. Old protector was getting progressively disfigured with every wash/dry cycle, and this one one seem like the best alternative available. Material is soft and has a bit of a cushion feel to it, plus it does not have an obvious plastic underliner like the old one we had. So far it worked as expected, preventing spilled sippy cups juice from getting to the mattress, and any collected juices washes away with ease. Would have no problem recommending this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Leo K

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a traditional 10” deep queen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. I returned one because it did not fit a traditional size 10” queen mattress. The pad itself was too short however I kept the second one because it fit fine on a full-size 10 inch mattress . are used it for gas this weekend, who are elderly and I was worried about protecting the mattress from an odor. It did work well. It is definitely not water resistant or waterproof for toddler’s but it’s a comfortable pad .
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect a new memory foam mattress. Recently had knee surgery and the cold water machine broke in the middle of the night, flooding the bed. The mattress would have been completely soaked if not for this cover. Doesn’t sound or feel like a waterproof cover either. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: winterbaby

customer_reviews.title: so good. It fits my memory foam mattress nicely
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It fits my memory foam mattress nicely. It doesn't get too hot or cold. I can't comment on the waterproof properties because I don't usually have food or drinks in my bed nor do I have small children that might wet. I keep a mattress cover on to extend the life of the mattress. Overall, this mattress cover meets my needs for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: TMN

customer_reviews.title: Much softer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had seen reviews talking about how comfortable this is, but I was still in shock when I pulled it out! It is soft without losing other qualities ( I trust it to protect my bed). Also, It is preferable to some other mattress protectors that feel like laying on a plastic bag. As an added plus, it helps in keeping my sheets in place, which is a problem I have had with my memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not sleeping hot!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a new bed, very expensive, and it's too hot. I went back to the store and they said I could do an exchange, but the only one that would really be cooler all night cost $1,000 more. Don't think so. I found this mattress pad and it had good reviews, so I got one and last night slept comfortably all night, didn't wake up hot after a few hours! If I couldn't take the heat from that mattress in winter when it's cold, I know it would be intolerable in the summer when it's much warmer. So glad I looked around for an alternative to getting a more expensive mattress!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Super angry for your product I’ve used it multiple times ...
customer_reviews.text: Super angry for your product I’ve used it multiple times in which I figured maybe I’m not using your product properly or maybe it just seeped thru from a different area where it isn’t properly covered. but this is now the fourth time in which I’ve hoped your product is water proof only to have it fail on me again. This isn’t water proof. I had my daughter wet the bed and the water seeped thru to the other side and ruined our brand new mattress don’t buy this product it’s horrible now her bed smells like urine thanks to your crappy product and I can’t get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Jose gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Soft! Fits like a glove! Takes a lomg time to dry but love it
customer_reviews.text: Soft, fits mattress like a glove! I poured water on it and it just sat there. It's definitely waterproof. The instructions said to tumble dry for 15 min though! It took an extra spin cycle to drain all the water that was stuck in it and over 60 min to dry! I hope that doesn't affect the liner in any way. I look forward to it preventing any leaks onto my kids mattress!
customer_reviews.author: K. R

customer_reviews.title: soft on top, plastic on bottom
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo is all the rage, so I decided to give it a try.I like the surface feel, and the slight thickness to the top layer. The elastic works well. The backing is plastic-like material. It was hard to wash because the water gets trapped by the plastic and becomes heavy and soggy after the spin cycle. Because the temp says low dry, it takes a long time to dry. It smells like plastic after drying so may need to off gas before putting in on the bed. It feels nice to lie on but doesn't seem to quite stretch with the mattress pillow top.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs and Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog mom and let my little ones sleep in bed with me. There has been drool, and poop and pee on this and none of it got onto my mattress which I am ecstatic about. It is very high quality and fits my deep mattress perfectly. I've always struggled with finding a mattress pad that fits my deep mattress but this one fits very well! The only downside I've had to this was that upon putting it in the washer it did throw my washer off balance because it does tend to hold in a lot of water. Be sure to use a low spin speed with it and it may need an extra spin cycle.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my memory foam mattress and it works great and is super affordable. My dog has had accidents on the bed more than once and I just stripped the sheets and the mattress protector off and three them in the wash and dryer and good as new. No leftover smell, and no leakage onto the mattress at all. Spill and "accidents" won't get onto the mattress. Easy to put on and super easy to clean. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Haemi Chang

customer_reviews.title: As advertised - but HOT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not realizing it was waterproof. Was just looking for a mattress cover with extra-deep pockets. I will say that the cover itself is very nice and the pockets are large and stayed put over my 12 inch mattress plus 4 inch topper. It is also soft and quiet, not like the noisy plastic covers I used when my kids were small. BUT it is so hot! I believe the waterproof-ness holds and reflects our body heat. It was just too much for us. We had to take it off. Unfortunately, I had already washed it so cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Selstrom

customer_reviews.title: For all the marbles - this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I bought another brand which was not completely leakproof. We are potty training with a brand new bed set and mattress and need something to stand up to the test. This is the one. It’s really soft, thick cover and works! This gets my vote over the other mattress protector with 25k reviews. Good luck out there, parents.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Decent, just not 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this waterproof mattress protector. It fits nice and snug, is very soft, and is waterproof. However, after using it for several months, (and numerous potty accidents from my son) I can see that it is indeed, not waterproof. It definitely helps, but you can feel some wetness comes through. So I use a big plastic waterproof cover that zips around the mattress, and then cover it with this one. This mattress protector would do great with small spills, but it doesn’t protect when a kid outright pees the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress protector. Others made my husband and I sweat at night. This one does not. Others also had a rough terry cloth towel-like material which I didn’t like. This one has a very soft smooth surface. You can sleep directly on top of it if you wanted to. I’m just hoping it will hold up when I throw it in the washer machine. With others the plastic vinyl waterproof layer ripped apart. We’ll see. Good thing it only needs to be washed every couple months. It fit like a glove on my king size mattress. Does not make any sound and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Urine Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof is a misleading description. Although I didn’t test water on this mattress pad, it was completely ineffective at preventing toddler urine from immediately soaking through to my mattress. I would recommend avoiding this mattress pad if your intent is to protect your mattress from urine. On a positive note, the pad is an attractive color and fit nicely on the mattress. The elastic wrapped around the corners of the mattress easily. I think the seller should change the name to “decorative mattress cover which does nothing to prevent toddler urine from soaking your mattress.”
customer_reviews.author: Cori Anne DeVard

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this mattress protector for 1 month and it was miserable. I thought it was due to the hot weather, however after sleeping with the house @ 68 degrees and STILL waking up drenched in sweat, I’ve come to realize that it is all because of this POS. I would give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is great so far. My daughter just turned 3 and had a potty training "accident" on the bed the very first night that I got a new mattress. I was so glad that I had this mattress protector on the bed! It didn't leak through at all and was easily washed. I'm curious to see how it holds up after multiple washes, but it did a great job on the first test!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: AirB&B Approved!! Must have for all Mattresses!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a single thing that I do not like about this product! It fits snuggly, feels soft, is water resistant, made of bamboo, keeps you cool and has a really nice bamboo pattern. As an AirB&B host, I highly recommend this product! You just cant beat the deal and it looks great too making the mattress feel brand new! That said, I will not buy any other product when it comes to mattress covers! - Professional Review by an AirB&B SuperHost
customer_reviews.author: TubbsMedia

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly soft
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They're super soft and comfortable. They don't make any noises, like some of the other water proof mattress protectors make. I love that the top of them isn't the Terry, towel feeling that a lot of others are. It's so soft, comfortable and smooth. I always keep a sheet on top of my mattress protector, but if my toddler gets crumbs all over the sheets, this is so comfortable that I'm content sleeping on just this mattress protector. It's incredible and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: This mattress protector is "meh"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup for when I'm washing my complete mattress enclosure I got years back from Bed Bath and Beyond. This bamboo mattress protector is soft and easy to put on since it only covers top and sides. But, it makes me sweat a lot and it allows the fitted sheet to slide off the corner of the bed while I sleep. That's very annoying. So I give this 3 stars. It's "meh". Does the job, but have some obvious cons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protector! Definitely waterproof and doesn't make any noise ...
customer_reviews.text: Great protector! Definitely waterproof and doesn't make any noise under the sheets. Can be difficult to launder. Due to the plastic lining it retains water during the spin cycle and so we line dry it because we don't want all the excess water in our dryer. Since we have a king it's nearly impossible to wring out by hand. Thankfully we have a cement basement where our laundry area is so we just dry it down there.
customer_reviews.author: JTanner

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this mattress cover a few weeks but I love it so much more than my last one. The material is soft and smooth unlike the terry cloth like material which is so common. It fits snug but perfect. I don't have to tug at it to get it to fit and it hasn't come loose or off since I put it on. Remarkable with how much I toss and turn while sleeping. It is too soon to know of it will stand the test of time but so far I am very impressed and happy with my purchase. I definitely recommend this mattress cover!
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Lake

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE IT DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these mattress protectors on every single bed in my house because we recently got some new mattress. Well I hadn’t ever had the opportunity to actually know how well it worked until last night. My daughter fell asleep in my bed and Peed and guess what....my mattress underneath this protector was soaking wet! DIDNT WORK AT ALL! I purchased this based on reviews and it actually feels as though it would be Water resistant but I assure you from first hand experience it is NOT!! Very disappointed! Don’t waste your money! I now need to find new ones that actually work to protect all my mattresses!
customer_reviews.author: Chris ownby

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have one for evey bed in the house. You never know when a kid is going to crawl into bed with you, or your spouse decides to put that glass of wine on the bed and jump. You know like they show you how in the commercials! Totally happens in real life. And accidents happen and these sheets have been there for me through it all and have protected my matress. Super easy to clean up and put on the bed. I love them. Keeps my matress clean! Was worried they would be loud like the ones grandma used to have, but that's not the case at all. Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: "... came right when the seller said it would ..."
customer_reviews.text: The mattress protector came right when the seller said it would and it was in perfect, new condition. I'd just purchased a new mattress and it didn't feel right until the mattress protector went on. It fit perfectly and I have been enjoying it ever since. This is a good product and I would recommend this product and this seller to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It fits the mattress well. It absolutely does NOT feel like rubber or plastic—in fact it has a smooth, nice feel. It breathes. It has NO odor. It washes well, but DO follow the directions. It feels fine under a sheet and it protects form moisture. I hate rubber sheets and plastic pads. This one is perfect. Price represents value. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pelland

customer_reviews.title: It Saved My Bed From an Entire Cup of Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is everything they said it would be. I had my doubts because it didn't look that waterproof - until I spilled an entire cup of coffee all over my brand new memory gel foam mattress that was covered by this bamboo protector and a sheet. I was scared to look at it once I pulled the sheets and bamboo mattress protector aside, but it was dry as a bone and not one stain on it! This is a great product. I had no problem washing it and drying this product, either. I dried on low heat. I would recommend this to anyone and I would definitely buy it again. Thank you Utopia Bedding!
customer_reviews.author: barbs13

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS THROUGH. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product since December. Only today did it actually need to do its job and protect my mattress. My dog has incontinence and got up on my brand new purple bed without us noticing. She fell asleep and leaked pee. I figured oh well not the end of the world. We have a mattress protector. WRONG It seriously leaked right through. Absolutely disgusting and I can’t believe it. I should’ve read the reviews before I purchased. And to think I have another one on my sons bed. I will be buying new ones today and throwing this! Doesn’t do at all what it’s supposed to. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: It feels and looks nice but it doesn’t do what it suppose to do. It’s not waterproof. My baby took a nap and had an accident at first I wasn’t sure i touched and it felt like it was damp but It was winter then so the mattress was cold to touch anyway. Now it happened again in the summer and I’m sure this time that it is wet. This is a year old mattress and an expensive one so I purchased this one for this exact reason but this product failed and I’m so frustrated because it ruined my expensive Mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kavance

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Been over a year and still looks great.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress cover for over a year now. I have washed it plenty of times and it has held up great. We have multiple children and felt it was best to get a mattress protector for our mattress. Our bed has been thrown up on and gotten drinks spilled on it and our mattress has stayed protected through it all. It is very easy to throw in the washer and I personally dry it on a lower heat (though I don't know the rule on that). I came to buy another one as our toddler is moving up in bed size and I have no hesitations!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I like this mattress protector because it fits very well and it doesn't make that plastic sound when you are on the bed. Very quiet. I was able to put this pad on by myself because it has a lot of stretch to the apron. Seems to be very well made. I have an adjustable base bed and it stays on when we adjust the mattress. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RUSTY HOGLAND

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better.
customer_reviews.text: We received this mattress protector, washed it, and put it on, worked great for the first "accident". After the second washing we noticed a little dampness and smell on the mattress. After the third washing, you might as well just use a regular bed sheet an throw this thing in the trash! Protects nothing, everything leaks through.
customer_reviews.author: vigo74

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality. I bought this when we got a new mattress, to replace one we were given with our previous mattress. The former's waterproof barrier on back was in complete shreds from washing normally, and it was thin rough material. This is a nice thick, soft bamboo upper with a good quality solid yet breathable waterproof liner on backside. I've already had to wash and dry it twice and it came through great. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Liquid resistant! Tip: Dry in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and stays snug. Completely resistant to liquids. Difficult to clean in the washer b/c it holds a lot of water and becomes very heavy. I recommend spot cleaning & hand wash when you can. I dry it in the sun because the dryer takes a long time and you need to use low heat setting. We have a King Serta iSeries Hybrid 300 Plush which is 13.5" thick but this could fit a mattress 3-4" thicker. 1.5 years later- still fits great & my mattress still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: eestes

customer_reviews.title: Utopia Bamboo Matress Protector
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover. I've slept on it 3 nights now and find it very comfortable. It has very tight fitting elastic so it hugs the bed well. It felt a little stiff coming out of the package but feels great on the bed. I have no children so can't say anything about water resistance. It says that it keeps you cooler but not really sure about that statement. I sleep with a fan directly on me year around and this pad doesn't seem to cool me down but it also doesn't make me feel any hotter either. I think this was a good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable like a mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mattress protector. I use it in conjunction with Utopia Bedding Zippered Mattress Encasement so when my son pees the bed I can just whip this one off and not worry about the underlying mattress getting wet (it's never soaked through the Bamboo cover, but it's my insurance policy + if I don't get to washing the Bamboo cover that day I'm still protected).
customer_reviews.author: caesura

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these mattress covers. One for my 6 year olds room and one for my 10 year olds room which is also used a a guest room when my brother and his family comes over. I can say it stops leaks and is extremely comfortable. My brother's 1 year old spilled milk from his bottle in the middle of the night and thank God for this mattress cover protecting the new mattress underneath. I plan on buying a queen size soon for my 14 year old's bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3 Girls

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great value for coming in a two pack. It is waterproof and I layer them for accidents with my dog (she has seizures) or baby. Waterproof, fitted sheet, waterproof, fitted sheet...so all I have to do in the middle of the night is take it off and put it in the wash. No need to put sheets on while half asleep. The only thing I say is a drawback is that I am definitely way more sweaty sleeping on this, but good thing it absorbs it!
customer_reviews.author: sharnelle feril

customer_reviews.title: sleeps hot
customer_reviews.text: I’m in So Cal and this made me sweat while sleeping. I had to change it back out for a cotton mattress cover. Very slick material, sheets did not stay in place over or. Ultimately it was the heat that was just too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Frankenbush

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tested the water resistance yet so I cannot conform or deny how well it performs in this area but as far as comfort and fit it is perfect! The only thing I have as a complaint is that the bamboo print it has printed all over is dark enough that it shows through with light colored sheets, which isn’t a big deal but would just prefer that it did not. Will definitely buy again for my other beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve bought three now and couldn’t be happier. I have one on my 3 year old’s bed and ones for the other adult beds. We have a cat and sometimes worry he will get sick (like cats do with fur balls) and it’ll go through to our new mattress. This gives a huge piece of mind. It’s so soft and great quality. The pockets are nice and deep for thick mattresses, but also work perfectly for thinner mattresses. I don’t get hot either when sleeping in it which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not waterproof. Not even close. Spilled less than a cup in total and figured ‘that mattress protector I put on there a tear ago will protect the mattress ‘ so I was slow to get back to unmaking the bed. Mattress itself had absorbed a fair bit. I feel very bad for the parents who are posting on here :( If you’re buying it to simply protect a mattress from usual stuff (sweat and saliva) its great. Perfectly quiet and, yup, it obviously breathes (a bit TOO well apparently)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Merow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one for another bed recently. Really think it's a great product. When the first one came I opened it and gave it a test for waterproofing. Poured a little water on it and checked to see if it soaked in or went through. NOPE. Protect your expensive mattresses with this. It is also soft and smooth. You never know when someone is going to be sick, or a pet will get on the bed and do whatever, someone has a beverage while reading in bed and spills it. Accidents happen. Be ready!
customer_reviews.author: Rita S. Reames

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, be careful if you have light-colored sheets
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't had it too long yet (about a week) so I can't comment much on longevity, but this mattress cover appears to be made very well. Nice heavy materials and no bad stitches or anything as far as I can see. Bought along with a new memory foam mattress and it fits quite well, though it does seem like it might be a bit snug if used on a higher pillow-top mattress. My only complaint, which is purely cosmetic: the print shows through if you use light-colored or white sheets, which I didn't even think about until it was on the bed, so keep that in mind if that's the combination you're planning to use.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Soft comfortable mattress cover.
customer_reviews.text: I have this same cover in a king size but recently bought a full size one for my daughters bed just in case of spills or accidents. The mattress pad cover is comfy, does not feel hot and does not sound like a garbage bag like some others we’ve owned before. If you plan to use white sheets the bamboo leaves print on this cover might show through light colored sheets. Otherwise I would recommend and would buy this again. I haven’t had to test the water or liquid permeability yet but I will update review once this happens.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lajavrac

customer_reviews.title: Really a very nice mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a new twin mattress, and needed a new pad, as broken springs had ruined the other one - there was no saving it. I decided to try this one. I liked that it was both waterpoof, AND "breathable", so it wouldn't make you sweat. The texture is great, and feels great on the bed. It went on easily, onto the very thick memory foam mattress. It is holding up very well, no problems at all. For the next new mattress, I'll be buying this protector again. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: KatyKatMidwestTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this mattress protector! I have dogs and cats who spill things and jump on the bed with wet and dirty feet. These keep the stains from passing through, wash up perfectly and fit snuggly on my mattresses! There’s no plastic so you don’t have to worry about melting or tearing when washing and drying. They don’t pop off the mattress or wrinkle. I’m so pleased with this purchase, I would give them 6 stars if I could!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have made this purchase because this mattress protector works great and it doesn't make that plastic noise when you move around on the bed. We have a 3-year old who only wears diapers at night but because he loves milk, he has quite a few accidents even with a diaper. He sleeps on a full size bed and this is a great product for keeping your mattress protected and dry. Also, you can dry it on a normal setting in your drier without having the waterproof barrier melt (which is what can typically happen with cheap waterproof mattress protectors).
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover has been put to the test several times since I purchased it. It's held up really well. Liquids don't leak through. I dry it on low, no issues there. Would definitely purchase another for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: e mj

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other waterproof mattress protector we bought at a big retailer, this one is so much better! This is soft, feels durable and waterproof. The other one that went back to the store was stiff and crunchy when you sat down on the bed. This is softer than any other mattress protector I’ve purchased regardless of being waterproof or not.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking mattress protector, very quiet. Unfortunately, I bought it for protection against accidents when my toddler sleeps with me. It is not in fact waterproof. It protects against minimal liquid spills (ie inch of water in a toddler cup did not permeate) but it gave no protection against his accident overnight. Our $1k brand new mattress is now ruined bc I used this as my waterproof cover & it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of what mattress cover to buy because each one I explored said they are waterproof and it was my understanding they make you hot. I wanted a natural fabric that didn't make noise or feel plastic. I was even unsure of ordering this one because some of the reviews said it got hot. I get night sweats and hot flashes and wanted to be sure I didn't get one that added heat! Ends up I love it! It is beautifully made - nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L.

customer_reviews.title: No real protection and retains heat
customer_reviews.text: This does not have whatever it needs to protect from liquid on the bed. I had a ceiling leak and my mattress corner was soaked through. Not nearly as effective as my last one, which was not bamboo. Also keeps the heat in, retaining it even after I've left the bed for 5 minutes so when I get up I don't come back to a nice cool place to fall back asleep, not good in FL.
customer_reviews.author: si1vergrl

customer_reviews.title: Really bummed, toddler's pee leaked straight through
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's soft, cushiony, silent, however it's not completely leak proof. We cosleep so I got this to use during potty training nights and it works if they just leak a tiny bit but when she full-blown wet the bed it just completely soaked through to the mattress. Super annoying and totally defeats the purpose of having this at all. If it actually worked and kept the mattress dry it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Mohundro

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice enough, thin, slightly strange fit.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress cover for a 10" memory foam mattress. From the picture I thought there would be a bit more padding on the top, and there really isn't. Which is fine as I really just wanted the protection. The fit is also a bit strange. I tried vertical and flipping horizontal, but there's always one side that has a bit more room and is a little loose. This would definitely fit a larger mattress height needing deep pockets, perhaps that's why I have extra fabric. All in all I think this will do the job it's intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT AND WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is perfect and gets the job done. Fit perfectly and I forget it’s there. It’s kind of like a raincoat material and is easy to clean. *****UPDATE**** My mattress is now ruined because my daughter had an accident in the bed and it soaked all the wash through! Didn’t hold up or perform as advertised. Also terrible customer service. The seller refused to make it right and then stopped replying to my emails. TERRIBLE PRODUCT AND WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover does what it advertised! My son doesn't pee the bed every night, mostly on nights when he gets too cold or forgets to use the restroom before bed. So far he has had about four accidents since we got the cover (about a month now), the cover has protected the mattress from getting wet or the smell. It washes very well in the washing machine. I've dried it in the drier without a problem. I highly recommend this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this for 2 weeks. The best analogy I could come up with was that I felt like a pancake laying on a hot griddle. It has left my house already. I was sad about that though. The quality was nice and it washed well and still fit the bed after washing. It just reflected my body heat back and was unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Utopia Bedding Waterproof Bamboo Mattress Protector because our existing mattress protector was loud and not very comfortable. We have a very high end king size bed with a "cooling" top. The Utopia Mattress Protector is EXCELLENT! It is soft, quiet, and durable. The difference between our mattress itself and the protector is indistinguishable. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine for a daybed it is 30 years yet soft and seems to lay very well and doesn’t punch up although there is plenty of stretch in the elastic which I don’t need for a daybed but it works out fine I have not tried the the urine test but I don’t need to until I’m older I guess and I don’t have any babies to take care of
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great price point for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I use it over a 2.5 " memory foam mattress pad to provide protection and cooling. It has super elastic edges for a tight fit, gives good coverage and it's comfortable for sleeping. The material quality is good for the price. Haven't washed it yet, so cannot comment on durability or ease of cleaning. If it holds up well, I'm likely to purchase another for the guest room bed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost ! Soft and great quality
customer_reviews.text: True to size and def great for kids beds both my kids have them easy to put it doesn’t slip off the mattress which is big for me bc I had another that did that from another company, love that when washed it stays the same crispy white and super soft great sturdy material ordering more for my vacation home Mattresses
customer_reviews.author: Liizz_Legiit

customer_reviews.title: Love the softness. It's so fluffy and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten it wet yet, but I love the fabric softness. One particular thing.....they have printed the word bamboo in green font on the cover. So, if you have light colored sheets like I do, you will be able to see that printing. No big deal if your make your bed everyday. But I don't and it is a bit annoying. Update a year later. (May 2020)...I love this mattress cover! It is still so soft. Works perfectly and keeps our mattresses protected from child accidents. Highly recommend. I always air dry to make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: LA Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Too stretchy, will not stay smoothed out
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because I wanted a “ breathable” cover for my new mattress. Takes up little room in washer, which I like but I had to spin it four times and I still felt like it had a lot of water still left in it. Took a long time to dry, almost felt rubbery when I would check it for dryness in dryer. It also stretches into wrinkles on the bed so my sheets and comforters look wrinkled. I stretch it tight every day but it bounces back into wrinkles. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BB

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Bamboo Mattress Protector – Breathable and Waterproof Mattress Cover - Smooth Grip - Fits 17 Inches Deep - Easy Care (Queen)
feature_bullets: MATTRESS PROTECTOR - Queen size mattress protector measures 60 x 80 inches - fits up to 17 inches deep; fitted cover style design with elastic all around
POLYESTER MATERIAL - A blend of ultra-tech polyester (70%) and bamboo (30%) to keep you comfortable throughout the night
WATERPROOF - It keeps your mattress dry as it is waterproof; it provides durable construction and protects the mattress from dust mites
OEKO-TEX CERTIFIED - Oeko-Tex Standard 100 factory certification ensures that the fabric meets the safety and environmental standards. Great for people with kids, pets, etc.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine wash cold or warm on gentle cycle; tumble dry low; do not iron; do not bleach; do not use fabric softener

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars13,613 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
